author: dsandberg
msg: Added back Paul Speed's conditional SSI enhancement.  Updated code/regression tests to better emulate Apache SSI.  Fixed bug w/ expression parser's handling of literals.

author: dsandberg
msg: Added back Paul Speed's variable substitution SSI enhancement.  Updated code/regression tests to better emulate Apache SSI.

author: amyroh
msg: Fix for bugzilla 14781 so that CGIServlet doesn't depend on 1.4 api.

author: amyroh
msg: Make new "rotatable" attribute of AccessLogValve visible from admin webapp.

author: amyroh
msg: This patch allows for the following:
%{xxx}i  xxx is the name of the incoming header
%{xxx}c  xxx is the name of a specific cookie
%{xxx}r  xxx is an attribute in the ServletRequest
%{xxx}s  xxx is an attribute in the HttpSession
For %A - uses InetAddress.getLocalHost() instead of hardcoded "127.0.0.1"
Patch also allows access log not be rotated. This is done by adding a new
attribute called rotatable. It defaults to true. If set to false - then the
access log does not rotate. (Which will make a lot of tomcat-users happy)
